scripts.postinstall: cp app/config/config.json.dist app/config/config-development.json && cp app/config/config.json.dist app/config/config-production.json && cp app/config/module.json.dist app/config/module.json && cd app && npm install
scripts.start: cd app && export APP_ENVIRONMENT=development && export ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true && ./node_modules/.bin/electron ./main.js --inspect=5858
scripts.postpolymer-build: rsync -avh app/build/ build/ --delete && rsync -avh --ignore-existing app/node_modules/ build/es6bundle/node_modules/ --delete && rm -rf app/build && cp app/style/icon/logo.png build/es6bundle/icon.png
scripts.clear-all: rm -rf app/node_modules && rm -rf build && rm -rf releases
